page.title: 12LEISURE
page.content: Many people come to the area to spend their leisure time Hunting, Shooting and Fishing. {Tha Hunt:}meet 3 times a year between 1stNov and 1stApril about 30 huntsman and horses take part each time. Last year 8 foxes were seen none killed. {Shooting:}takes place 12th Aug to 31st Jan. Average of 8 shoots per season. Birds shot are Pheasant, Duck and Woodcock. Average bag 100 per day, 12 bore shotguns used. Pheasants hand reared by Buccleugh Gamekeeper. {Fishing:} In the area some people fish for Brown Trout, Rainbow Salmon and Grayling. The salmon fishing season is from 1st Feb to 30th Nov and trout from 15th March to 30th September. Fly and spinning fishing are used. Last year 415 Trout and35 Salmon were caught.
